reviewText:
When I want to inspire friends, especially kids, I show them the documentary on Mother Teresa, this excellent one on Peace Pilgrm, and Amazing Grace and Chuck.  And they work!

Watching this documentary is almost like having known Peace Pilgrim.  I definitely recommend getting it if you like feeling inspired and wish to inspire others.

She is an example of what Mother Teresa said about ordinary people seeing a need and responding in extraordinary ways.
